title: NFC West Breakdown + Dinner Dates, High Ceilings - Fantasy Football Podcast for 7/14
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, a 2022 season preview for the Rams, Cardinals, 49ers, and Seahawks! Andy, Mike, and Jason review the offseason for the NFC West, while predicting what to expect in 2022! Is a suspended DeAndre Hopkins worth drafting? Will Cam Akers and Trey Lance have breakout seasons? Plus, the latest edition of Best Ball Breakdown, presented by Underdog Fantasy! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 14th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW
